name: Item List Output Parser
semantic_context: Return the results as separate items
natural_language_description: 这是 Item List Output Parser 节点。主要用于: Return the results as separate items

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: numberOfItems (值: None) - Defines how many items should be returned maximally. If set to -1, there is no limit.
separator (值: None) - Defines the separator that should be used to split the results into separate items. Defaults to a new line but can be changed depending on the data that should be returned.
